main event: Ground visual sighting of a bright ball of fire that was red with blue lighting surrounding the area, which disappeared behind a tree.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright ball of fire that was red with blue lighting surrounding the area.
The object disappeared behind a tree, suggesting it was in the distance.
The witness estimated the object was about 10 miles away at its closest point and was traveling at an estimated speed of 2,500 mph.
The witness had seen similar types of objects more than once in the past, indicating this was not an isolated incident.
The object was reported to the Kettering Police at 12:30 pm on the same day of the sighting.
sighted object: bright ball of fire with red and blue lighting
